artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical in blue paper covers with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a man on the left in black breeches, a blue vest with white trim, white and blue striped socks, a brown and purple striped coat, and a large brown muff; woman in the center holding a pink fan and in a green and pink gown and a green hat with pink ribbon and brown plumes; woman at right in a white gown with an orange coat with brown fur trim, a brown muff with a blue bow, and a hat with blue ribbon
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Premier Cahier, 1 Décembre 1788
